summary: A group of old family members bands together when a despicable family member thankfully expires.
cast: LL Cool J|Jada Pinkett Smith|Vivica A. Fox|Loretta Devine|Anthony Anderson|Toni Braxton|Cedric the Entertainer|Darius McCrary|Whoopi Goldberg|Richard Gant|Masasa Moyo|Dominic Hoffman|Patrice Moncell|Clifton Davis|Kellita Smith|Aloma Wright|Tamala Jones|Ellen Cleghorne|Tamela J. Mann|Natalie D. Wilson|Sandrina Nicole Shepherd|Tony Paul|Chuck Campbell|Dwayne Adway|Sharon Shakur|Ellis Williams|Oren Williams
title: Mejor en el cielo
